name: Marshy's Double Rage
description:
You star as Marshy a humanoid Marshmallow trying to get to the top of the mountain. You will rage as you attempt to climb what seems to be an impossible feat. 

This game was created in 12 hours for the United Game Jam. The theme for the Jam was "TWO".  Marshy's Double Rage incorporates this down to its fundamentals. The controls. You control Marshy with only two inputs. This control scheme adds to the difficulty and makes the game very unique.

A few assets were used to create this game:

Music:

  • Retro Platforming by: fesliyanstudios.com
  • 8 bit menu by fesliyanstudios.com

Sound Effects:

  • 8bitgame4 by audiosoundclips.com
  • 8bitgame5 by audiosoundclips.com
  • 8bitgame9 by audiosoundclips.com
  • 8bitgame10 by audiosoundclips.com

Art

  • sawblades modified from super mario world
